roleset.name: (allow to) eat grass
roleset.note: GRAZE-V NOTES: Can't deny that ArgA! (from graze.01-v)

example.name: basic transitive
example.text: The Soviets' explanation is that the anthrax came from one lot of animal feed made from the bones of cattle that [*T*-1] grazed on soil that was naturally infected with anthrax spores.
example.arg: on soil that [*T*-2] was naturally infected with anthrax spores

example.name: intransitive
example.text: They graze at the Farmers Market, a combination gourmet food court and grocery store, while a pianist accompanies the noon fashion show with a selection of dreamy melodies.
example.arg: at the Farmers Market, a combination gourmet food court and grocery store
while a pianist accompanies the noon fashion show with a selection of dreamy melodies

example.name: with causal agent
example.text: The local rancher grazes his cattle in John's front yard.
